## R1709 (simplify-boolean-expression)

### :x: Problematic code:

```python
# to be addded
```

### :heavy_check_mark: Correct code:

```python
# to be added
```

### Rationale:

Emitted when redundant pre-python 2.5 ternary syntax is used.
